channel.title: RSS feed for tag csr on Raymii.org
channel.description: RSS feed for tag csr on Raymii.org

item.title: OpenSSL Decoder Script
item.description: This is a simple PHP script which decodes a certificate, csr or connection and displays the information it finds.

item.title: OpenSSL Command Generator
item.description: This is a simple page with a form which you can use to generate OpenSSL commands to, for example, create a key, certificate and a CSR.

item.title: OpenSSL One liner to create self signed certificate
item.description: This is a one-liner for OpenSSL to generate a self signed certificate and private key.

item.title: OpenSSL Generate CSR non-interactive
item.description: This is a short command to generate a CSR (certificate signing request) with openssl without being prompted for the values which go in the certificate's Subject field.
